name: Friends in Low Places
description: Shady bars and dark alleyways are your friends, being shunned from the civilised light of those who do an honest day's work. You spawn with a Bazaar coin, which holds no monetary value, but showing it to other criminals or chaotic bastards might just score you a job for a little while. After all, only other pilferers, thieves and murderers have a Bazaar coin.
